price: បន្ទាប់មកមូសាបានបោះដំបងរបស់គេ រំពេចនោះវាក៏ ក្លាយទៅជាសត្វពស់យ៉ាងពិតប្រាកដ។
arabic: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعۡبَانٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fa-alqā ʿaṣāhu fa-idhā hiya thuʿ'bānun mubīnun
